net.algem.enrolment

Class CourseEnrolmentDlg

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.algem.enrolment.CourseEnrolmentDlg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener

    public class CourseEnrolmentDlg
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener
    Dialog for course choice. Dialog for choosing a course during enrolment process and defining a time slot within available schedules.
    Since:
    1.0a 07/07/1999
